name: Productivity,LLC|BuildingDigitalCitizens
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Join our community. We are citizens using technology to connect online and in-real-life to play at the playground and talk about how we are managing our digital ecosystems. Our community curates news, opinion, and research on technologies to improve your ability to communicate and collaborate at work and home. To spark engagement and help you reclaim your time to focus on you, your family, and your community. 

"Building Digital Citizens" is our daily newspaper of news, opinion, and research about digital tools and policy to improve your ability to communicate and collaborate at work and home. 

"We are All Digital Citizens" is our monthly newsletter spotlighting digital tools to improve your ability to communicate and collaborate at work and home. In this newsletter, we share digital tools that help you reclaim your time to focus on you, your family, and the community.
